# UIBarButtonItem.Style

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the style of an item.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Constants

- **UIBarButtonItem.Style.plain**: A button style with plain text styling.
- **UIBarButtonItem.Style.bordered**: A simple button style with a border.
- **done**: A button style for a done button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.Style.prominent**: A button item style for a prominent button.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Customizing item appearance

- **style**: The style of the item.
- **tintColor**: The tint color to apply to the button item.
- **isHidden**: A Boolean that determines the visibility of the item.
- **isSelected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is in a selected state.
- **width**: The width of the item.
- **possibleTitles**: The set of possible titles to display on the bar button.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
